info.title: Bug Tracker Library Manager
info.description: Gets But Tracker projects. It includes open projects and team projects.

method.name: getPublicProjects
method.description: Get all public projects. These projects allow creating issues from any user.
method.returndescription: An array of all public project information.

method.name: getTeamProjects
method.description: Get all projects of the current active team. These projects may be open or not. They can be managed by team administrator.
method.returndescription: An array of all team project information.
